name: RAMBOT
description:
GMTK theme: 
Guns are used for shooting, and gun recoil is used for movement. Scrollwheel is also used for movement, but interacts with recoil movement to provide precision.

Platforms: 
Windows

Third-party tools:
Unity Engine 2017, Blender, Audacity

Participants:
Mislav Pozek, Antun Krljan
